S=\beta\,t\,{\langle c^{+}_{i}c_{j}\rangle}_{0}\sum_{i\neq j}\cos{{{\theta_{i,% j}}\over 2}}\,e^{i\phi(i,j)/2}+{\hat{H}}_{z}\,\,\,,

{\hat{H}}_{so}=\lambda_{so}{x\over 2}{{a^{2}}\over{\phi_{0}}}S\sum_{i}{\bf m}_% {i}\cdot{\bf b}_{i}\,\,\,,
